text: Ocotea puberula is a species of evergreen tree in the plant genus Ocotea of the family Lauraceae. It is found in Argentina, Brazil, French Guiana, Guyana, Mexico, Peru, and Suriname. ==References== puberula Category:Flora of Argentina Category:Flora of Brazil Category:Flora of French Guiana Category:Flora of Guyana Category:Flora of Mexico Category:Flora of Peru Category:Flora of Suriname Category:Least concern plants Category:Least concern flora of North America Category:Least concern biota of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ocotea puberula
